name: Balance Personal Training LLC Debbie Kulmer
text: Sarah's expertise in the science of massage is awesome!  Her personality and disposition enhances the massage experience!

resp.text: We are so glad you enjoyed your massage

name: Lacy Nauck
text: The best massage I have ever had! Made me feel completely comfortable and relaxed. I was and to shut down for a bit and my body is extremely grateful. I would recommend 100%

name: Elizabeth Vargas Johnson
text: One of my best experiences! I expressed I wanted to feel relaxed and Sarah ensured of that. She took car of a muscle pain I had been experiencing and had a great restful sleep that night.

name: Hannah Lansdell
text: My husband loves Miraculous Massage and booked an appointment for me. Sarah was very sweet and welcoming.

resp.text: We're so glad you enjoyed your visit!

name: Karen Hazzah
text: I had a great experience with Sarah. She worked out the kinks in my neck and shoulders so I felt much better when I left; plus, price is good value;

name: Aaron Lussi
text: Best...massages...ever

name: Bobo8992
text: Sarah was great! She was very professional and made me feel very relaxed and comfortable. I highly recommend her services!

resp.text: Thank you so very much. Sarah is great isn't she? Thank you for you business. It is a pleasure and an honor to serve you.

name: Platinum Construction & Remodeling (Eric R. Michael)
text: That's because a different name was used.

resp.text:
Dear Platinum Construction and Remodeling,
Looking at our records we do not see any indication of your having been to our office. We strive for excellence in service and love earning great ratings from our wonderful clientele. It is unfortunate that you are not among them.

Unfortunately, Mr. Eric R Michael, the name provided also was not a customer.

name: Kim Dillon
text: Melaine is the only massage therapist I know that will tailor your massage specifically to what’s going on with your body. Plus, she is so therapeutic in her personality. It’s not just a massage; it’s for your health’s good and feels like therapy in all senses of the word in the beautiful surroundings  of her new office. Come see her & make a beautiful new friend.

resp.text:
Thank you Kim,
Each and every individual deserves individualized treatment. To be heard. We love solving even the most challenging issues with specific solutions.

name: Trameka Persaud
text: I had the 90 min massage with Melanie and I had a wonderful experience.  She hit all the right spots and could tell where my pain was coming from. I got off the table like a new refreshed person. Thank you and I will come again when I'm back in town!

resp.text:
Trameka,
So glad to know you had  wonderful experience. I look forward to outdoing it next time!

name: Melody Talks Marketing
text: Love every massage therapy session with the awesome Melanie! I highly recommend Miraculous Massages in Madison, Alabama!

resp.text: Thank you Melody! We love giving every massage!

name: Dave Swain
text: Brittany gives an AWESOME massage!!  You need to go!

name: Michael Hearst
text: Not impressed nor did I get an hr..

resp.text: Unfortuantely Mr. Hearst in order to recieve a hour massage you must show up on time not 30 minutes late. The full value of the massage was credited back to the lovely lady you chose to abuse. You are not welcome here now or ever again in the future.

name: Nisey
text: Ali is absolutely wonderful! He was very informative and professional during my massage it was very much needed. I definitely will be returning. The atmosphere is great 👍

resp.text: Thank you very much! Looking forward to seeing you again soon.

name: Robett Robinson
text: Great place to get relaxing therapy

resp.text: Thank you very much! Looking forward to seeing you again soon.

name: KENNEDY SPIVEY
text:
Love this place staff very friendly and professional!!!!! Best massage in Montgomery check it out !!!!!
Kerry p

resp.text: Thank you very much Kennedy Spivey! We are happy to hear about positive experience! We appreciate your business.

name: Beverly Garrett
text: Love Mind and Body Spa.  Great atmosphere.  I have referred several of my family, friends, and colleagues to them.  Personable and gives a great massage.  Ali has fixed my bricked up muscles several times.  211❤❤

resp.text: Awesome review Dr. Garrett. It's our purpose to help you feel your best and we can't wait for your next session. And as always we appreciate your business.

name: M N
text: Foad has been working with me for 2 years now after 2 shoulder surgeries. He deserves 10/10 stars and has been a godsend! Love his encouragement and focus.  Have recommended Mind and Body service to my  friends!

resp.text: We are so happy to hear this! Thank you very  much for the kind words and taking the time to leave us a review. We look forward to your next visit!

name: David Alexander
text: Great service,  their therapy keeps me working. I recommend highly.

resp.text: Thank you! We look forward to seeing you again soon.

name: Jeff Welch
text: Foad provides the best deep tissue and myofacial therapy in Montgomery. I recommend to anyone with back issues or sports injuries.

name: John Smith
text:
Foad at a time when my circulation was in bad shape rescued me with a deep Tissue orthopedic medical massage and workout weekly. My Doctor recommended him and was decision I ever made.
Circulation is good and no more aches!

resp.text: I was pleased to welcome you to our practice. I look forward to seeing you again. And I appreciate your physician's confidence and trust.

name: Jorge Serafin
text: My experience here has been extraordinary! I have had many different types of massages throughout the world, but my experience here has been the best overall. Foad has been outstanding in his treatment and recommendations.

resp.text: Thank you Jorge! We are delighted to hear that you had a wonderful experience with us.

name: Revewer Smith
text: The massage therapist at this studio is VERY nice and personable, but his technique is not therapeuatic at all.  I left the massage session feeling worse.  His technique is just to massage and massage without regard to whether he is relieving tightness or not.  Unlike some of the other studios that have a technique, he doesn't really seem to have  a technique.

name: Jack Durham
text: Always a relaxing experience to visit Foad at Mind & Body. wish I could go more often. Very knowledgeable about a variety of health and healing regimens. Also a fun guy to chat with. Always leave with a smile.

name: Larry Chapman
text: Foad has been a faithful friend for 20 years. He is a good man and excellent at what he does. Countless times he has taken care of me and my family. Thank you Foad for running a first class business!!!

resp.text:
Good afternoon Larry
I wish to take this opportunity to thank you for your business for past 20 years.
You have paid me the nicest compliment possible. I appreciate your confidence and trust.

name: Mark McLendon
text: Great people and top notch service.   I started coming in tons of pain and not only did the massage help but the stretches and exercise homework got me back on the road to health.  Can not say enough good things about Foad and his team!

name: Aaron Esfahani
text:
Foad and the whole staff at Mind and Body are first class. Likewise, the massages that I have had here are far better than what I've experienced home in Atlanta. Additionally, they specialize in sports and therapeutic treatments that will have you coming back for more. As an honest reviewer, I would have to say that you must try this place!

AAE

name: Keith Blackwell
text: Experienced my first massage at Mind  and Body today.  I could not  have  been more pleased with the experience - it was the best massage I have ever received.

name: Carrie Yates
text:
I began going to see Foad at Mind & Body a little over a month ago, and already, I can see a marked improvement in my symptoms. For example, I was unable to turn my neck all the way to the right for about a month when I first saw him.  Foad repaired that in two sessions.

In addition, he makes it an extremely comfortable and easy assessment process. I never got the sense that I was next in line, or that I needed to be in a hurry. The atmosphere is quiet, relaxing, and tranquil. He makes all of his oils home made, and they are incredible. He gives feedback, suggestions, and has a wholistic approach--all without making you feel like you've done something wrong, or haven't done something you were supposed to to take better care of yourself.

Very reasonable priced, very effective, and very easy to do in the middle of a day.

resp.text: I wish to take this opportunity to thank you for your recent visits to my Wynlakes location. It was a sincere pleasure to be of service. I look forward to seeing you again.

name: Anne Mazyck
text: Great experience. It definitely helped the headache. Ali is very gentle and very good.

name: Customer Critique
text: HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE!!! I wouldn't recommend this place to my worst enemy. The therapist was late and I felt he rush through the massage trying to get himself back on schedule with no regard to me or my needs.  There was nothing relaxing or soothing about the massage.  I felt  exhausted and pretty beat up afterwards.  There was no balance or method to his technique.  Not worth the time or money.  DEFINITELY WILL NOT GO BACK!

name: L Skipper
text: Foad is an excellent therapist.

resp.text: We are so happy to hear this! Thank you for the kind words and taking the time to leave us a review. We look forward to your next visit!

name: Zsuzsa Rozgonyi
text: Foad gives a 5 star massage. I highly recommend Mind & Body. Great atmosphere, great treatments! Love, love, love this spa!

resp.text: Thank you 🙏

name: lens lens
text: Foad is an excellent massage therapist. He can pin point and treat areas that create problems for other areas. He is highly recommended.

name: Arpi Sekeryan
text: I have been getting massages regularly for years, and since I moved from Canada, I needed to find a massage therapist and fast...  Luckily, I found Mind & Body because Foad"s Thai massages,  are by far the best!!

name: Mary Allinder
text: I would recommend Foad and Ali to anyone searching for agreat place to destress and unwind . These two men have great skill in massage therapy and many more ways to get the best out of life! I highly recommend Mind and Body Holistic Spa!

name: Missy Mathis
text: Best Massage in town! I highly recommend!

name: Ryan Powers
text: Unbelievable! Not only did Foad relieve my lower back pain but he gave me specific stretches to help prevent lower back pain!

name: Susie White
text: Foad has been my go-to massage therapist for at least 5 years now.  I wouldn't trade him for anything!

name: Nia Taylor
text: I had a great first visit. I came in with back and neck pain and William, the owner, used his magic fingers to help me. He is clearly knowledgeable and passionate about what he does and gave me some great suggestions on how to help myself at home. Very nice guy and will definitely continue to come here.

resp.text:
Thanks Nia! I'm so glad you enjoyed your visit.
- William Henson

name: Leslie Dejohn
text: William and his team are all excellent in what they do. I recently had a stretch session with William and he helped release areas in my hips and shoulders that were giving me a great deal of discomfort. He was careful to make sure that I was feeling the stretch in that specific area. He communicated with me each stretch and what I was supposed to be feeling. I would highly recommend a stretch session for anyone that is experiencing tightness in any area of their body. Can’t say enough about this group and their knowledge and professionalism. I have been seeing them regularly for at least 3 years.

resp.text:
I'm glad you enjoyed your assisted stretching session Leslie. And thank you so much for the review!

- William

name: Kelly Lansden
text: I got a massage from Abbey Porte a few days ago for a chronic pain flare up and she did an amazing job! Last week I could barely function because I was in so much pain, but now I feel great! My pain dropped from a 7/10 to a 2/10. That’s major improvement! I highly recommend Abbey for pain management massage. She knows what she’s doing!

resp.text:
Thank you so much for the review Kelly! We're so glad you enjoyed your massage with Abbey the other day! It's so good to hear that your pain levels have dropped so dramatically.

- William Henson (owner)

name: soapy jones
text: A wonderful experience with a wonderful group of people. I highly recommend and am looking forward to my next appointment!

resp.text: We're so glad you enjoyed your visit!  And thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review.

name: Mary R
text: I’m so happy I found this place! I’ve struggled with back and neck pain since I was a teenager, among other things here and there, and now that I work in dentistry it’s been even harder on my back. I wanted to find a place that not only gave a relaxing massage, but could recognize and target my problem areas. William listened and explained what he would be doing and even gave me some at-home tips to get things loosened up. I’ve already booked my next appointment and can’t wait to see more results!

name: Tiffany Postell
text: Rob Ginwright did a great job focusing on my problem areas. He explained everything throughout the session and made sure I was informed about everything. He even gave me tips on things I can do at home, and I have continued to see improvement. Definitely looking forward to my next session.

name: Debbie Momma Dee Dee
text: I went to APM with chronic pain in one shoulder. Abbey carefully and persistently worked on every muscle knot until I had complete relief! Her knowledge of the body muscles was extremely impressive and she knew exactly where the problem was likely occurring and how to solve it. I will be a regular from this day forward!

name: Allison Daniel
text: Rob Ginwright has helped me so much. He was very proessional and carefully explained everything he was doing. I feel better than I have in years. I can't wait to go back.

name: Jill Nelson
text: Clean and very quiet. The therapist was very nice and willing to help my pain area. She was very social with me which was very nice and just over all a great therapist. Everyone there was very friendly and nice. I would definitely recommend this place for all your needs or just for a day of relaxing!

name: Chyna B.
text: Clean and relaxing space. I had a male therapist for a deep tissue, he was great, I left feeling relived, I will be back!

name: Amy Spinks
text: I received a 90 minute massage treatment with Alex and she was WONDERFUL!!  She was very professional and very helpful in relieving my pain all while providing a relaxing, "pampered" massage!  I suffer with Osteoarthritis and had been told this treatment would help with day to day muscle tension.  It was true and I will be returning for more massages with Alex!!

name: Frances Tombrello
text: The Physical Therapist was very kind and very interested to help me.  This was my first visit and have another appointment on August 30th. I felt very comfortable ,.  Would recommend Mr. Henson to my friends and family. (One of my family members goes every 2 weeks and has been doing this for several years.

name: Mona Squeels
text: I just had my first massage by Alex and it was absolutely wonderful. She was informed, and made sure I understood everything. It was wonderful to be able to explain what was wrong and her explain what she was going to do to help! I cannot wait to go back.

name: Cindy Carruba
text: So wonderful! Went in for a extreme pain in shoulder and next day it was gone! Definitely recommend this place for any kind of massage you need.

name: Drew Moore
text: I was having severe sciatic nerve pain. I had a 90 minute session with Alex that helped tremendously. Very knowledgeable and professional. Wonderful place conveniently located.

name: David Burrowes
text: Great! They have helped me tremendously! I thought I needed back surgery, but Alex got me feeling better and able to do more than I have in a few years. Highly recommend!

name: Shella Sylla
text: William is an extremely skilled masseuse. He took the time to assess my unique situation, and worked to alleviate muscle pain, soreness and even some structural issues that I had mentioned to him.  I love working with people who are obviously passionate about what they do, and William exemplifies this through his skill and mastery of his craft.  I highly recommend that anyone who is looking for more than your typical "feel good" massage and who wants to get real therapeutic results should go and see him.  Totally worth the investment!!

name: Cindy L Bili
text: William worked on trigger points in my neck and shoulder.  I have not had pain since my first visit, which was 3 days ago and I have had chronic pain for years.  I am so excited to have found a massage therpist that I truly feel can help me with eliminating back pain!

name: Bob Berry
text: Jennifer's 30 minute deep tissue was just what I needed. I had several knots that she worked out and the massage results lasted a long time. I am sold on these folks and they are very convenient to I65 at Hwy 31 (in Hoover) and are very professional and accommodating. Great massage!

name: Julie Jefferson
text: I had a wonderful massage with Alex. She was very professional and thorough.  My back pain was greatly relieved.  I would definitely recommend her to others, and will be returning myself.

name: Morton Ulakovits
text: I've been here 3 or 4 times now.  They do a great job at catering to your specific issues.  For me, a massage every month is just what I needed. Friendly, professional, convenient and affordable would be how I describe them.

resp.text: We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with the services we provide. Thank you for your feedback.

name: Lauren Hughes
text: I've struggled with persistent muscle tension in my upper back, neck, and lower back for quite awhile. Physical therapy and dry needling have helped tremendously, but the muscle tension was still present all day every day. The tension makes it difficult to maintain proper posture and contributes to lordosis in my lower back. After one treatment from William last week, I can see a big improvement. Tension in my chest is greatly reduced, which makes maintaining proper posture much easier. Any headaches I've had since then are mild, and I've had less upper and lower back pain. I still have a long way to go, but I'm excited about the progress made in just one session!

name: Megan Therrien
text: I highly recommend Alternative Pain Management! About 6 months ago, I finally decided to go to a massage therapist on a regular basis to try and deal with recurring upper back problems, headaches, and TMJ issues. I have had massages all over the place (massage envy, spas, other therapists), and I don't think I have ever met a massage therapist as attentive and creative as William. Even though he is working on the same places, every appointment is a new experience and he ALWAYS manages to find little places I had no idea were even hurting! William is easy to talk to and work with, and I appreciate that he offers advice and tips to help manage my problems in between visits. I can't say enough good things about William and Alternative Pain Management!

name: Matt Butler
text: Went to see William at APM at the suggestion of my orthopedist because of a nagging muscle knot in my back. This was my first visit and William was pleasant and thorough with his explanations of what he was going to do and what I should expect. I have noticed some improvement with my back but he mentioned it could take a couple of sessions to help release everything. I go back in a week to continue the work on my issue and will look forward to continued relief.

name: Kathryn Groat
text: My husband and I have been going at least once a month for over 2 years now for therapeutic massages. Jennifer and William are both very knowledgeable and professional!

name: Brandy Wills
text: Jennifer and William are a great team! Jennifer has helped immensely with my pain management! I highly recommend!!!

name: Greg Mullinax
text: William at APM is very skilled in deep tissue massage. I've had 4 visits now and every time my condition has improved dramatically. He is treating me for multiple injuries and aches. I am very happy with the results. I highly recommend William.

name: Heather Batey
text: William is a knowledgeable and extremely skilled massage therapist. He uses a variety of techniques with different patients to achieve the best possible outcome. He is trained in myofascial release and neuromuscular therapy as well as the more popular Swedish and deep tissue techniques. The atmosphere is relaxed and inviting, and I always leave feeling so much better. Highly recommend!

name: Shane Nicholas
text: I've been going to Alternative Pain Management for about 6 months now and the results are incredible. I have had a dull pain at the base of my skull for a decade and within a few treatments it was completely gone. No more dull pain. No more headaches. William is amazing and didn't stop at treating the symptoms but worked until he found the source. As someone that dealt with recurring pain for years and thought there was no hope, I can't recommend Alternative Pain Management highly enough. Best in Bham!

name: Monika Croom
text: At first I wasn't sure what to expect as I have always gone to a spa type massage deal, but because this is for an injury/pain, this alternative management was the next step for me outside doctors and chiropractors.  Although walking in I was reluctant because the set up was not what I had expected, I found it to be very clean and comfortable.  William Henson is very professional and knowledgeable in this field.  He was very soft in his approach, but his hands were really strong to really get into my pain issues.  I have only had 1 treatment but I have made an appointment for another as I experienced a good bit of improvement off one treatment.  At the end of the session, he also took the time to show me exercises specific to my ailment.

resp.text:
Thanks Monika, I'm always  happy to help in any way that I can.
-William

name: DannaMichellRay
text: I have lower back pain and trying to avoid another epidural. My pain reoccurred from a yoga class that was a little advanced for me which left me in pain - again.  A friend recommend Jennifer @ APM so I gave it a try.  Jennifer was well informed with my injury and knew exactly what I needed.  To be honest, deep tissue massage is not a relaxing and soothing kind of therapy but it's specific to help relieve my very tight muscles and connective tissue. I instantly felt some relief and looking forward to my second session.

name: Izz Noland
text: Great service, a hidden gem in Hoover. Alex did a wonderful job explaining everything and working on my extremely tense back!

name: Jessica Peterson

name: Rebecca Johnson
text:
So unprofessional. I cannot believe this place has so many 5 star reviews. They did not gove me a pleasant experience and I did not even receive a massage. I scheduled an appointment for a Massage using Groupon on a Saturday in
March. Later I realized I had a scheduling conflict so I rescheduled for a different day. When I came in they had it scheduled for next month on the same day. I remember distinctly scheduling my appointment for this day this month because I TOOK THE DAY OFF for this appointment. I would not have scheduled an appointment incorrectly when I was specifically scheduling it for the day I asked off. So when I arrived they said that I could reschedule. So I tried to schedule it for a day I’m off so I don’t have to ask off again and apparently Saturday’s are only for members! How did I first schedule my appointment for a Saturday then? I’m not a member but I still had it scheduled! Please give me an explanation for this. However, Groupon helped me with my issue and allowed me to trade in my voucher. If I have any advice for anyone thinking about using this company. Don’t.

text: The Massage Therapists at LumaLife are extremely well trained!  After my recent 90 minute massage, my neck and back had never felt looser!  I stood taller. The massages are truly therapeutic. The spa is very private, super clean and relaxing.  If you want to really treat your body and mind with relaxation and rejuvenation, then you need to rely on LumaLife for your massages.  Simply a cut way above and I have had massages all over the world and at world class spas and hotels.  At LumaLife, you are relying on true professionals who care about your massage making a difference for your body and mind.

text: Be very Careful she takes your Credit Card before hand so she can charge your card if for ANY reason you have to cancel! Even if you have a family emergency. My grandson was rushed to the emergency room in the middle of the night with a appendicitis being rushed into surgery. She called me when I was suppose to be there, I tried calling her back with no reception couldn't get her on the phone. Had my person assistant try to reach right back out to her and called several other times leaving a voice mails with no response and she still changed  not just a cancellation fee but the entire massage!  She never returned any of my calls and finally when I had my next appointment says sorry I am sure you understand why I have policies in place! Yes I do understand however I also understand customer services and if one of my clients or customers who have a legitimate family emergency I would also NEVER charge fee.

resp.text: Loretta, I apologize for the inconvenience. I understand you’re upset however, I always make sure to take the appropriate steps to contact my clients before charging a cancellation fee for no shows per my cancellation fee policy. Please understand my time is valuable and it is not fair to other clients who get turned away from a potential appointment due to a no show. As discussed via text message earlier today, I am willing to apply 1/2 of the no show fee towards a future appointment.

The best  in the business

text: I got a great massage here yesterday. The place I regularly go to was closed. After reading the reviews I made an appointment at Healing Heaven. I am glad I did. I would highly recommend this place.

name: Nick P

text: Best massage I've ever had, she actually used pressure that was needed as well as massaged all muscles. She worked on the knots in my back (much needed),  explained the process and discussed my intake form with me with all medical information. Oh and she actually explained the issues she discovered with me which has never occurred anywhere else I've been. Love this place they are very professional and informative.

text: 10/10 would recommend. Christine was just a great person and really made me feel comfortable. She was solely interested in making you and your body feel ten times better than when you walk in. Thanks!

text: Kinda Leary at first but once I got there very comfortable and it was great can’t wait till next session very professional and knowledgeable about the body would highly recommend Christine she was great

text: I have gone to Christine about a half a dozen times now. She has helped me immensely. Every time I go there I learn something new. She has helped me with an alignment issue I was having by showing me a number of stretches to correct it. Christine also utilizes essential oils in her therapy and has the ability to find and release all the muscular tension build-up in my body. I sleep like a baby after one of her massage session. And above all, Christine is a lovely and caring person who believes in helping others!

name: Colby Robinson
text: I visited Christine at Healing Haven recently for my first ever massage and I had a fantastic experience. When I stepped into her office it was like I left all my stress at the door. She was excellent at making me feel comfortable and relaxed. Not only was the massage a great experience, but she used essential oils to make it even better. If you are looking to have body work done, I definitely recommend visiting Christine.

name: Brandon Patterson
text: Excellent service! I don't know where to start with how much their service made my weekend. Absolutely impressed with the quality and I can't wait to go again!

name: Randy Lee
text: Christine is very knowledgeable and highly skilled. Definitely one if the best massage experiences I have had. I highly recommend Healing Haven and Christine.

text: Our boss hired this place to come and give us 15 minute chair massages and it was great the lady doing the massages was really nice down to earth and generally cared about making you feel better I will be visiting the business for sure

name: Dianne Judson
text: Amazing and serene experience!

name: Laura Hardin
text: Christine has been my massage therapist for three years now. Every single session has been excellent. She continues to provide fabulous service.

name: Cameron Claire Starnes
text: Christine is amazing!!  I was having a lot of pain and she helped me greatly!  I highly recommend her services.

resp.text: We appreciate your positive review Cameron and we're glad our services delivered what you needed. Cya later!

name: Suzanne Tjarks
text:
I've been coming to Dr Wagner for 3 years. As a competitor, I beat my body up daily and at my age it gets hard to cope with sports  injuries the way I could when I was younger. Dr. Wagner is very knowledgeable on sports injuries. I trust his opinions and listen to his advice even when I want to be stubborn and think I am still 21!
When he adjusts me the pain is gone instantly
and I feel like a new person again. He shows concern and compassion for his patients.  His staff has always been very helpful and they know me  by name, that's always a special touch.
I love that he has combined the Growing Younger Spa with his Chiropractic Care...it makes it easy to come to one place now. The office is just beautiful!  I have sent several people to Dr Wagner for various reasons and they have all been very appreciative...he is a very good Dr.
Thank you Dr. Wagner!
Sincerely
Suzie Chitwood

name: Jeanna Wing
text: I suffer from a lovely bout of scoliosis and need regular chiropractic care. I have been seeing Dr. Wagner for the almost 15 years.  He is a great chiropractor (and I have had a few over the years!) and he LISTENS to you which is huge!  I would (and DO) recommend him to anyone in need of these type of services.

name: Chad Noles
text:
I have been having lower back pain and shooting pain down my right leg for over a year now. I went to the ER last year because it was hurting so bad. They gave me pain meds and muscle relaxers and sent me on my way. 2 visits to my family doctor and the same result.

I finally gave up and went to see Dr. Wagner a few weeks ago and I am so glad I did. The insurance and billing is so easy. They do not require an appointment either which makes for for convenient visits. Just walk in after your initial setup and enter your info on the computer and straight back you go.

Dr. Wagner did an in depth consulation, took some x-rays to see what the situation was and he put me on the path to feeling pain free again. He is the first chiropractor I have ever been to, but I am a believer now. I would highly recommend him to anyone. Coming from a previous skeptic, that is saying a lot!

name: Steven Seagraves
text: Dr. Wagner is top-knotch.  Great facility and treatment.  I started coming here after an auto accident and 3 years later I still come as needed, about once every other month or so...even though it is in the next town over and I pass at least a dozen other chiros on the way to his office.  Being a full-time desk-jockey with a stature of 6'3" and a previous neck injury, I encounter neck and back issues regardless of physical activity outside of work.  Dr. Wagner always lends an ear and knows how to put me back on the right track -- I always feel great and pain-free after an adjustment. His facility is state-of-the-art with the easiest, hassle-free insurance/billing I have EVER encountered.  I would recommend him to anyone, hands down!

name: Paxton Sanders
text: Quick and easy to deal with, plus immediate relief for my back.

name: Jarrod Smallwood
text: Very nice massage, scheduling is a problem as I have consistently arrived at scheduled appointment and told they are very busy that it will be a later appointment time.. But, when you get in the massage is great!!

name: Shakeria
text:
I'm from Birmingham, al and every time I come to Huntsville I go here to get a massage. They're professional, kind, and I LOVE that they don't beg for a tip which makes customers feel more comfortable to give one.

Pro: is that you free hot stone included. Get techniques from the therapist. Will work longer on areas that you specify.

Con: sometimes they get the stones when the session is almost over so you don't really get to enjoy it as much. I would work on that consistency if I had to provide any feedback.

resp.text: Dear Shakeria, thank you very much for your comments and suggestions. Next time if you come here, you can ask the masseurs first if you have any requirements, including the hot stones that stay longer. They will do it the way you like.  , Try to achieve your satisfaction and look forward to your next visit!

name: CJ Donovan
text: This was my first massage and I wish I caught the lady’s name she was wonderful. I will be going again soon.

name: Veronica Villa
text: I have experienced the best message in town. Your knowledge of the oils as well as the ability to respond to my personal tensions and strains is exceptional! Will definitely come back. Thank you!

name: Abigail Morey
text: One of the best massages I have ever had! Remarkable and very enjoyable. Came in feeling stressed and left feeling relaxed and happy! Thank you thank you!

name: Michael Lee
text: I had a wonderful massage here in Rose Massage. It was very relaxing, really helped my back pain. Have booked a full session and looking forward to it. :)

name: Terrell Nixon
text:
My neck and back hurt so was looking to get it worked out.  Was a little skeptical after reading some of the reviews but thought would give it a try.

I was pleasantly surprised.  I called.to make a appt for a other day as it was late.  They said they had a table open so I went on in.  The place is in a small strip mall but most of them here in Huntsville are.  Once you get inside looks like most small massage places.  I have included a few pictures from their website as they are accurate of what you actually see.

The lady was very nice and very professional.  She gave me a very relaxing massage.  I would have like a little more work on my neck but I did say anything as I wanted to just see what was their normal.  Only other improvement I can think of is she did not do the front of my legs at all.  Since I do alot of lifting and crawling around that is always a sore spot.  But over all I left feeling very relaxed.

I did opt for the shower table as some recommended to get the oil off.  Again very professional and make sure "everything" that needed to be covered stayed covered.  Thought it might be awkward but the way she did it made it feel very professional so really did not even think about it.

The only real negative I can say is the same as of other peoples reviews.  They leave the door slightly open so anyone walking by can see in.  I understand from a security view but the walls are paper thin (like most every other place you get a massage) so you can hear everything so I do not really see that the pros outway the cons for doing this.  I could not really relax and although I really like this place it was the reason for 4 stars vs 5 stars.  It also would be the one thing that made me look somewhere else ☹.

Also one note since it came up in some of the other reviews.  No one pressured or even asked me for a tip.  I did give her one as she did a good job but she never asked.  The only thing they asked was if I would like a 4 hand massage (I only booked a 60 min) and when I said not tonight that was that.

Over all a great place and so far I recommend it for a great relaxing massage if you dont mind everyone that walks by your door seeing in 🧐.

Will update if I go back.

resp.text: Hello, Terrell. Thank you for giving us the opportunity and we are glad you like our services. We keep improving our management and services base on our customers' feedbacks. Thank you for your business and hope to see you soon.

name: andrew ausin
text: Always very nice and courteous, I always call ahead and can get in same day. I’ve gotten the standard massage every time and they always help my back feel a lot better!

name: Jack Smith
text: This was not a good experience at all. I thought I would give them a try. Opted for the 4 hand massage as it was supposed to be their best. The whole time door left open so one of the masseuse could go and deal with people coming in dealing with them at my door, and answer the phone. The 2 ladies talked the whole time to each other like gossiping, but couldn't understand them. The lady answering phone and stuff wasn't even in room half of the time. She finally just brought the phone in with us and just started answering it there. As I was leaving the girl giving the massage ask for tip. I thought well she did give pretty good massage herself and tipped her. Then she fussed saying it was 2 of them I needed to tip the other lady to! And kept insisting! I just left, $120 massage and $20 tip. Save your money and go elsewhere.

resp.text: Hello, Jack. Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate our customers' feedbacks because that’s how we can improve our management and services. We do have rules like no talking during massage sessions, no asking tip after services etc. We now have highly trained therapists and and we will prevent these happening again. Thank you. We try to create a relaxing and comfortable atmosphere for our customers. That’s how we gain so many loyal customers. Thank you.

name: Prodigal Son
text: Real bad experience I had with these people first I called 20 mins before coming in I was told to do so once I get to both locations they told me they made a mistake and that they were closed. BAD BUSINESS

text: This location bis conveniently located behind Whole Foods off Memorial Parkway.  They have a useful online web page for making appointments.  There wasn't any wait.  The quality of the service was quite high and they very generous with the time.  The price is reasonable and they off a hot towel after the massage.

resp.text: Dear customers, thank you very much for your feedback. We hope every customer will be satisfied with the service, hope to see you again

name: Cole Joe

text:
This place is a gem! I started going here after my spin instructor told me about this place.  I can get in almost immediately when I call.

They don't speak english very well but it doesn't matter.  They have a 60 min $60 special and you can't beat that.  The massage therapists always ask how much pressure you want, and if you want deep- some of them go DEEP... so make sure to let them know.

I don't want to tell you who I request because you will steal them from me.... Okay... Hidy and Sheliy are who I really like.  I have used others and they are great too but these two really know how to get into my target areas.

Side note: when they leave you alone for a few min don't get scared (I did the first time) but they are getting hot towel to remove the oil.  Just wait it out...

Enjoy!!

name: Gene Peppers

We apologize for what happened. Thank you for your business. We now have well trained professional therapists will offer the best customer service!

name: T

name: Brian Lucas

name: joel lightner
text: My first ever full body massage did not disappoint! Excellent prices, super friendly staff, and left feeling like a million bucks.

name: Almosta Farm
text: This is our first couples body massage. They made us feel very comfortable, and accommodated us however we needed. Loved it!

name: Adrian Abshire
text: My visit was excellent - the masseuse was very good and friendly. She helped with all the sore spots and did not rush.  I feel great and reinvigorated.  The waiting room is nice and the rooms are clean and very comfortable.  Will recommend to my family and friends.

text: Outstanding!  Service, professionalism, atmosphere and price are great but the staff, Michelle, Heidi and Mia make this my go-to place to fix the knots whether from work, traveling or just sitting on the couch too much. You will not be disappointed with Shàng or the Ladies who will leave you relaxed and revitalized. My thanks Ladies and I'll see you again soon.

text: Amazing service every time, very professional staff, clean and tidy spa. Went for a couples massage twice now, once foot massage and once table massage. Heidi is amazing (wife’s favorite) and Mia is awesome too. You cannot go wrong at Massage Shàng!

name: MARGARET PENNY PTERNITIS
text: I went because I had purchased a Groupon for a 60 minute foot massage. Place is nice and clean. Michelle is AMAZING! I have diabetes and she made my feet feel so much better. Cannot say enough good things about them, will be back soon!

name: S A
text: The BEST and only massage spa I will go to in Huntsville Madison area. Nicest sweetest ladies work here, I always have a good time and feel like a new person walking out of Massage Shàng. They take care of you like real friends ❤️

name: Mike Williams
text: Amazing massage therapy by Mia. Nice, friendly and very professional. She has the gentle hands of a delicate woman but the strength of a strong man. Can cater to any level of intensity. Would definitely go back again.

name: Scott G.
text: Tried Massage Shang for the first time and have to say the massage I was received was outstanding.  Very clean and friendly establishment.  Prices are also unbelievably low over commercial massage establishments.  I will definitely be a repeat customer.

name: Aaron Hansen
text: Very good massage, will be back

name: Dewane Mills
text: Michelle is very nice !

name: Marina Kubishta
text: Located in Madison, Nature's Way Massage and Spa is tucked away in a quiet business complex.  The place smells wonderful, like relaxing aroma therapy oils.  The music was quiet, the room was dark, and the massage table heated (which was a new one for me....but welcomed).  Carolyn was very thorough in her massage, from my toes to my fingertips.  I got a wonderful deal on my massage, as well.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words.

name: Kesha Jones
text:
As I entered into the spa Mrs. Carolyn greeted  me at the door with her mask on and a smile and that made me feel very welcoming, she asked me the questions about Covid-19 before heading to the massage room. I received a deep tissue massage which was absolutely amazing!!!!! Mrs. Carolyn is not only professional (very good at what she does) she also has a great personality.
To be honest when we converse it definitely didn't seem like it was my first time meeting her.

Very clean
Very professional
Very friendly
I felt so relaxed and comfortable around her
Enjoyed our converse
I already have a second massage scheduled 😁

resp.text: HI Kesha, thank you for your wonderful testimonial. I am always 100% committed to providing excellent services in a safe comfortable environment. Please tell your friends and come see me again soon!

name: Sarah Willis
text: Everything was clean and professional. She is following the recommendations regarding sanitation very strictly. I had a deep tissue, and she worked very hard to work through the areas that I have the most issues. Highly recommend. Also very reasonably priced.

resp.text: HI Sarah thanks so much for your kind words and review. I am committed to providing the best services in a safe comfortable environment. Glad it helped you. Come back again soon!

name: Marie Wynn
text: First off I received an awesome massage! It helped my aches and pains and gave me great relief.  However at this moment, the directions on Google maps is wrong and the prices on the website are wrong. Be sure to ask if this makes a difference.  Actual address is 250 Sun Temple Dr., Madison

resp.text: Hi Marie, glad you enjoyed the massage. I have now fixed the address and issues you mentioned. You can see my new website at natureswaymassageandspa.com Thanks again!

name: Carolyn Bryant
text: Good place to have a massage.

name: joey patterson
text: Nice visit very friendly.

resp.text: Joey, thank you for your kind words.

name: Lora R. Frazier
text: Thanks a lot!

resp.text: Hi Lora thanks for your 5 star review! Come see me again soon ok?

name: Michael Dugglas
text: Thanks!

resp.text: You are very welcome Michael! Come back again soon!

name: Summer King
text:
[Disclosure: I am a Massage Therapist myself, so my expectations are higher than most.]
I found the clinic / spa to be calming and inviting. The individual room of the therapist (Valerii) that I saw was peaceful. The table was quite comfortable! Unbelievably soft.
The massage was targeted to an area of my neck with strained muscles and she knew exactly how to work that area to bring some relief. Great mix of both therapeutic and relaxing touch.
I appreciated her use of heat during the session, as it really penetrated into the muscle bringing almost immediate relief. The hot towel traction at the end was so needed! Thank you!

Her technique is so good that I'm fairly certain I will cancel my membership elsewhere to see Valerii on a more regular basis going forward. I really liked that this wasn't a corporate operation, or nationwide chain. These are individual therapists who are all working very hard to bring exceptional service to their clients. And sometimes you don't always get that personal feeling at a chain.

resp.text: Summer, thank you so much for your kind review. I have started the memberships, so I hope to see you soon!

name: Katie Adams
text: Valerii is very knowledgeable and helpful! You can tell she really cares about her patients becoming pain free!

name: Trever Stearns
text:
Words can not explain how much care and attention she puts into your pain. A very wonderful experience.  As my son would say.
She is awesome!

name: Stacey Smith
text: Very amazing session 👌

name: Sue Kondis
text: Valerie is a very professional and experienced massage therapist.  She is punctional and makes you feel soooo good.  Highly recommend her services whether you are in pain or just need some pampering.

name: Shelley M. Freeman
text: Warm Welcome, Warm inviting atmosphere.  Valerii actually listens to your body, she's there in the moment with you when your on her table.  Valerii is an exceptional Massage Therapist and is very knowledgeable about the muscles and the complications they may be creating in your body.  I'm a Massage Therapist and was in search of a really caring, knowledgeable Massage Therapist for my Neck, Back & Shoulder pain, needless to say, I've found my Massage Therapist in Valerii De Loach😊🤗😉 Thank you so much Valerii!

name: Shaun “MrRichCreeper” De Loach
text: This was my first massage, ever. It was very good. The pressure was perfect and I think I fell asleep. I will definitely be back.

name: Dana Neese
text: Valerii was flexible and worked me in before Christmas. She was friendly and knowledgeable, asked good questions, and I got a great massage!

name: Giselle Hollie
text: I’ve been a member at Forge Fitness since 2017! Since the first day I dropped in to check out what CrossFit was all about I’ve been impressed with the professionalism and enthusiasm displayed by the coaches and owners and the sense of community. The owners are awesome and I even got my tire changed by Rich one time! I now have a 13 month old and since he was 6 weeks he’s been going to the gym with me and everyone has been awesome around him! During the pandemic the gym took extra precautions to keep staff and athletes safe. Equipment was cleaned daily, athletes had designated spaces, and when everyone was at home the coaches took videos and sent us At Home WOd’s to keep everyone motivated and moving. I’ve grown so much as an athlete at Forge and I’m stronger and fitter than before I joined. I’m glad to be part of this special community!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Giselle for your dedication to forge. We have always admired how consistent you have been in your training. Keep up the great work and we can’t wait to see what else you accomplish.

name: Emily Ledet
text: I joined Forge about a year ago as a brand new crossfitter. The coaches and more experienced athletes were more than willing to help me out every step of the way. I have never experienced such a supportive community! We truly are a family. I have grown so much as an athlete due to the top notch coaches and programming and I have met some of the best friends I have ever had here. I can't give this gym enough praise!!

resp.text: You are the best and we totally agree about you being our family.

name: Pat O'Brien
text: I have been going to Forge since 2017. It's great. The coaches are knowledgeable and the community is fun to be around. It's a family owned business and you can tell. Rich and Patti do a great job of keeping things fun but also professional. I have seen this gym grow over the last couple of years. We get new equipment all the time and the facility is Grade A. I definitely recommend Forge to anyone looking for a gym. I found it doing an internet search in 2017 when I moved to Birmingham and it's been a wonderful experience.

resp.text: Well thank you Pat O’BRIEN… for the awesome review!

name: Stacie Jackson
text: Forge is a wonderful place that we look forward to every day. The programming is amazing, the staff is kind, caring and encouraging. The facility is amazing. The members are supportive of every fitness level. I also love the recovery room! I would highly recommend Forge Fitness!

resp.text: Thank you Stacie and we deeply appreciate all the support!

name: Hannah Grant
text: If you are looking for a gym that will take you in as you are and motivate you, this is the place. I am going on 8 months with this bunch and its hands down the best choice I could have ever made! The second you walk in the door on day one you are greeted with friendly, helpful, smiling faces. You will quickly NOT be a stranger! The members and coaches of Forge do not care if it is your first day ever in a gym, first time trying Crossfit,  if you are a scaled or  RX+ athlete, new mother getting back on your fitness journey, whether you're in your 20's or 50's, you will always get cheered on, coached, and pushed the same the same every single day in the best, positive way. With some of the best programming around, the coaches make it easy to be a better you.  They meet you where you are based off your bodies needs whether that's doing 1 rep or 15. Your gym friends quickly become your gym FAMILY that you stay after class with, and share laughs and good talks with. It becomes the best part of your everyday routine. Forge Fitness also features recovery shop options, sauna, childcare, cardio room, basketball court, soccer field, and track. There's a place for all members of your family here. I have been a member to multiple gyms across Eastern-Central Alabama, and you won't find another  home gym like this!

resp.text: This is hands down one of the most thoughtful review we have ever received. We truly appreciate you and all the support!!

name: Armando Guell
text: Amazing facility with a lot of culture in it! Atmosphere is great even when there are no classes going. The owner is a top notch guy, very helpful and passionate with what he does. I will definitely come back here as a drop in!

resp.text: Thank you Armando for the awesome review and come see us any time!

name: Nick Quinn
text: Forge Fitness is more than a gym, it’s a family! This is the most professional well kept gym that I have ever been a part of! Their coaches are very knowledgeable and they have top of the line facilities. You cannot go wrong with this gym!

resp.text: Love you Nick and appreciate you and all the support of Forge!!

name: genamueller30
text: From the first day I walked through the doors the Forge family has treated me like I one of them. It is hard to find a more welcoming group of people. This gym is amazing.

resp.text: You are the best Gena and we appreciate you so much!

name: Amanda Wineman
text: Haven’t been active since high school sports and this place is so accepting and excited to help you. Great supportive community

resp.text: Thank you for the support and the great review!!

name: Appachu Palecanda

resp.text: Thank you App!!

name: Harris Reynolds

name: Pablo Perea

name: ryan peardon
text: Amazing facilities. Amazing coaches. Amazing owners. I’ve been a member for going on 5 months and this place is all around amazing, from the friendly, welcoming, encouraging atmosphere, to the equipment and programming, and everything in between. I’m always glad I joined the Forge family!

resp.text: Thank you Ryan for the awesome review and we appreciate you choosing to being apart of our Forge family.

name: anvesh rocks

resp.text: Thank you!!

name: Sophia Hua
text: Was visiting Birmingham from Canada for the weekend and wanted to workout. I'm so glad I got a chance to workout here, great sweaty cardio session! Everyone was super friendly and the gym was very clean. Hope to see you guys again in the future!

resp.text: Thank you Sophia for the 5 star review. How was the Alabama game?

name: Josh Holden
text: Needed to use some equipment to get ready for Comp and they were happy to help. Did wod while I was there and really enjoyed it. Nice people, quality instruction and programming and great environment.

resp.text: Thank you Josh for the review and please come by anytime. Stay strong and stay healthy and good luck with the Comp!

name: TJ Gonser
text: Great culture great equipment great family run business.

resp.text: Thank you

name: Thomas Kopec
text:
I joined last summer (2018) and haven’t been able to be as regular as I would like- but even after not seeing me for a very long time the owner (Rich) recognizes me and stopped what he was doing to have a conversation with me to catch up. Those kinds of experiences really make you feel like you are pet of a family.

The coaches have all been wonderful, as well! They are very personable and interested in your individual fitness goals. They have been helpful with technique and suggesting scale (alternate) exercises when necessary also.

Finally, the other members have all been very welcoming and friendly, which again helps foster an inviting atmosphere.

The facilities are fantastic (they have showers so you can get back to work after a class), and I love being a part of Forge Fitness! No complaints! Come try it out! They let me attend a few classes before deciding if it was a fit for me or not, so come try for yourself!

resp.text: Wow, what an awesome review. It is so good to see you in the gym and we truly appreciate the review. We look forward to helping you meet your goals.

name: Jon Sheets
text: The environment was incredible. The people were really friendly and the staff were so helpful! Definitely going to revisit soon!

resp.text: That’s so much and appreciate the awesome review. Look forward to seeing you again.

name: Shree Bostick
text: Definitely one of the best gyms in the Birmingham area!! I couldn't have pick a better place to call my new crossfit home after moving to Birmingham!! Great atmosphere, people, coaches and owners!! To anyone looking for a great facility to train or get a good workout in at definitely choose Forge Fitness!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review!

name: Chase Glasgow
text: Just finished up my Basics 101 classes with Paula and it was a blast! Forge is the most welcoming gym I've been a part of. The facility is amazing, spacious, and has everything you could possibly want!

resp.text: Thank you for the review and we love having you in the gym!

name: Mela Donoso
text:
Being new to Alabama and not knowing a lot of people was a bit hard, but since starting at Forge I’ve met some awesome people who have made Birmingham feel like home now!
Even my kids love coming along with me, owners are awesome and so are the coaches and all members!
Truly a family/community feel to this gym!

resp.text: Thank you Mela for the awesome review and we are so glad you are enjoying it! It’s been a pleasure getting to know you and your family. #forgefam

name: Holly Cross
text: I moved to Alabama alone and not knowing anyone. I had never done CrossFit in my life but these people took me under their wing immediately. My home away from home, truly blessed. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Holly, I’m glad you feel that way but we believe anyone that is apart of Forge is family. We are lucky to have you and Boomer as part of the family.

name: Chris
text: Was in town visiting family and needed a place to get in a workout. Rich, quickly responded to my inquiry online and openly invited me to the gym. They had a large variety of equipment for a good functional fitness workout, it was clean and in good shape. The staff was very friendly, as well as all the members. I will definitely visit Forge Fitness every time I come back in town.

resp.text: Thanks for the review Chris and we look forward to seeing you again!

name: John Christopherson
text: Couldn't say enough good things about Forge! The coaches are awesome and always trying to help you improve. The gym is huge, has great equipment and alway kept clean. The showers and sauna are a plus. And most importantly the members are very supportive!

resp.text: Thank you John for the Awesome review and we are so blessed to have members like yourself!

name: Hobie Cole
text: Great environment and the staff are very helpful. Great place to workout. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review!!

name: Caroline Jenkins
text: Forge is an extremely welcoming gym with great crosssfit programming. The coaches are wonderful!

resp.text: Thank you for supporting us and being apart of our community. We couldn’t do it without the love and support of people like you.

name: Anne True
text:
Best gym experience in town. Great coaches and fun workouts. Come to get in shape, stay for the community. Getting to Forge after work is the highlight of my day.

Thanks for doing what you do!

resp.text: Thank you True! We appreciate you so much and it’s been awesome to watch you develop into such a great athlete.

name: Leigha McLendon
text:
Family owned and operated, and they make you feel like part of the family.
For me, a great deal of the attraction to CrossFit is the sence community, and none of the other CrossFit boxes I've been to have as great of a community feel as Forge does.
The coaches care, are knowledgeable, and always have advise and recommendations on how to scale any movement.

resp.text: Leigha, thank you for the warm review and kind words. We are so glad that you have enjoyed forge and we appreciate the support over the years.

name: Libby Loveless
text: Family oriented gym with the kindest people around. Talented, qualified, and intelligent coaches and administrators who support you and your fitness goals! This is a unique Crossfit gym.

name: Aaron Wolff
text: Best CrossFit gym in Alabama!

resp.text: Thank you Aaron for the review and the support!

name: John Gonser
text: Cleanest CrossFit facility I've ever dropped in. Great coaching and a very large gym.

resp.text: Thank you for the review

name: Haleigh Chastain
text: Forge is more than just a gym. It is a community where people come together to workout while forming friendships. I joined Forge 3 years ago when I moved to Birmingham and did not know anyone, now most of my best friends are from the gym. If you are looking for a new gym, I cannot recommend this place enough!

resp.text: You are the best Haleigh and we truly appreciate all your help and support of the years.

name: Grant Scoble
text: Forge Fitness did an excellent job of getting me back in the game. I also was able to learn best practices for recovery by having their recovery center available with my membership. You feel apart of a family as soon as you walk in.

resp.text: Thank you Grant for all the support and encouragement.

name: Kyle Schwab
text: Huge, friendly, affordable, and clean facility.  I highly recommend dropping in for a class and seeing this place.

resp.text: Thank you Kyle and we appreciate all the support!

name: Katie Lucas
text: Forge Fitness is definitely the gym to go to in the Vestavia Hills area. The owners, Patti and Rich, are so personable and friendly. They are always working to help you attain your fitness goals with a refreshing and positive attitude. Great environment, staff, and facilities.

resp.text: We truly appreciate the review and your support!

name: Michael Gonser
text: Extremely friendly staff, I love how big and spacious the place is, soccer field is amazing!

resp.text: Thank you for the review and come see us in Birmingham the next time you are in town.

name: Suzie Spooner
text: Forge is not just a gym, it's a community. A community of athletes with different skill levels. A community where athletes encourage each other to give 100% no matter where you are in your training. Forge offers coaches who are knowledgeable about each movement and who want to help each individual attain the goals they have set for themselves. Forge is a community of  friends. I wouldn't go anywhere else!!

resp.text: You are the best! Thank you for the review and being apart of our community.

name: Lindsay Sport
text: I have been involved in many Crossfit gyms throughout my years in fitness. The quad facility, the forge Crossfit community, and the equipment is the best around!  From the moment I stepped foot in forge I felt nothing but welcomed. If you want to come learn from some of the best at their trade and train in nice, clean, and welcoming environment- then you have found the place.

resp.text: That you Lindsay for all the support and it wouldn’t be Forge with out people like you.

name: Owen Stayner/ThisWorkplace360
text: Excellent space and outside area. This is good way to get to know people while working out.  Great sense of community!

resp.text: Thank you Owen for the support!

name: Alanna Smith
text: The facilities are top notch and you'll be hard pressed to find a more warm and welcoming community!

resp.text: Thank you Alanna and we appreciate all the support!

name: Aaron Scroggins
text: I have been going to Forge for many years, so I obviously enjoy it! I’m in sales and travel for work. I get to go into many CrossFit gyms and none of them compare to the facility we have at the Quad. If you are in town visiting or looking for a change please come and drop in for a WOD.

resp.text: Thank you Aaron for the review and we love having you as part of the Forge community.

name: Leslie Parrish
text: I went to this gym for over a year, and I'm telling you that there's no better gym in Birmingham. The owners, Rich and Chris, along with all of the other coaches, have a firm commitment to doing things the right and most safe way possible. I left this gym in the best shape of my life and with some of the best friends a person could have. So not only will you get a great workout, you'll also make a ton of great friends. I've since relocated to Tuscaloosa, but try to make it back to Forge as much as possible!

name: Pilar Rodriguez
text: Ive been to many Crossfit gyms before. The level of cleanliness and the resources this gym has is incredible. The staff and members are some of the finest people I have ever met!

resp.text: Thank you Pilar for the review. We appreciate all the support.

name: Jim Gonser
text: Dropping in from Kansas one of the greatest places and the nicest people amazing facility

resp.text: Thank you sir for the awesome review.

name: Shandi White
text:
Most positive gym experience I've ever had!  Forge has a created a family atmosphere with the motivation of your favorite high school coach combined with friendliness of your favorite church.

They care about your progress, and they notice when you're not there.  They're not just interested in your membership, they're interested in your success!

Whether you're new to CrossFit or a regular competitive pro looking for a more positive gym experience, Forge in Vestavia is the perfect fit.

resp.text: Thank you Shandi for the awesome review. Your such a great person and we appreciate your support inside the gym and out.

name: ghk142000
text: Just began working out here 3 weeks ago. Very welcoming and fun atmosphere with a lot of great people. Rich and the rest of trainers have been nothing but helpful. Makes working out fun again.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review! I can't wait to see what all you accomplish. Keep up the hard work!

name: ly walthall
text: Really great gym. This is a great CrossFit gym. I've been to several and this one is the best. Great floor plan, tons of equipment so you don't have to wait around for someone to finish to do your WOD. The trainer's are fantastic, they will push you to do your absolute best. Not to mention there are several amenities and concessions; showers, energy drinks, recovery drinks, coffee machine, protein supplements and these killer peanut butter balls that are to die for. If your looking for a place to work out that will actually push you and and has a great community, this is it.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome feedback! You didn't forgot one detail. You are the best.

name: Dan Odle
text: Great gym. Great coaches. Great people. While the workouts are solid and will kick your tail (in a good way), it's the community that makes the difference. We literally build our schedule around our workouts and are thankful for our Forge family.

resp.text: Thank you Dan for the awesome review. You and Stephanie have truly brought so much energy to our community. Forge wouldn't be the same without you both.

name: Parker Smith
text: I've been attending Forge for three years and there isn't a better gym in Birmingham! The attentiveness of the staff and the welcoming of its members is second to none! I give all the credit to them for helping me be in the best shape of my life.

resp.text: We love you Parker and you have accomplished so much in 3 years. Keep up the awesome work and let's see what you do over the next 3 years. Thank you for the great review!

name: Chase Meadows
text: Forge is the only Crossfit gym that I've been to, and it has so far been quite a positive experience. Proper technique is emphasized which has helped me stay injury free and improve my overall flexibility. I joined with the hope of regaining some of my previous quickness so that I could perform better in tennis and flag football, and it has certainly helped in that regard... You'll obviously only get out what you put into it, but all of the coaches are very knowledgeable and more than happy to discuss proper form, nutrition, supplements, etc. with you as well as demonstrate the correct technique of the different lifts when asked.

resp.text: Thank you Chase for the awesome review. We truly enjoy having you as a solid member of Forge.

name: Dalton Roberts
text: Friendly place where the people you work out with become your bestfriends. Have felt at home since the first day I walked in. Very encouraging people at Forge to help you be your best self. Classes all day to benefit your availability. Saturday morning Olympic lifting class and Partner WOD. Let Forge be the best part of your day.

resp.text: You are the best Dalton and people like you are the reason while people keep coming back.

name: Jacob W
text: Incredible space with some awesome members, coaches and owners. One workout and you feel like a part of the family!

resp.text: Thank you Jacob for the review and Yes you are part of the fam. Come back anytime and workout with us.

name: Brandon Simmons
text: I just started traveling to Birmingham for business and wanted to find a place in which to work out while I was in town.  I came across Forge Fitness on Google and messaged them to set up a meeting when I got in town.  I will be going here for the next few months while I am in town.  The trainers are knowledgeable, outgoing, and great motivators.  The place is incredibly clean and the equipment brand new.  Great owners and great members.

resp.text: We miss you Brandon and we appreciate all the support!

name: Jack Eisenhut
text:
Great CrossFit experience!  Chris Wade is a co-owner and coach at this gym.  It was obvious that he is an experienced coach with a passion for what he is doing.

They filled the entire hour giving the expected value to each member.  The class started with a group warm-up, moved to strength component, then the workout of the day and finally a nice stretch/cool down.

Finally, I travel for work and drop into many CrossFit gyms around the country.  If you live in Birmingham area, this is a gym you have to look at.

resp.text: Thank you the awesome feedback and we look forward to seeing you again!👊🏽💪💪

name: Lesley Hendon
text: I just started in June of this year with the hopes of loosing the remainder of my baby weight! Chris and Rich are amazing and have made getting back in to shape something I actually enjoy! I have pushed myself so much further than I ever did in a conventional gym and have seen great results. They explain everything in great detail and coach you closely so you learn the correct way of doing things. I was super intimidated of the whole "crossfit" idea but Forge has changed that perception and made it something I truly enjoy!

resp.text: Thank you for your support Lesley!

name: Haleigh Robinson
text: Great gym with awesome members and coaches. I originally chose Forge because of location, but now there's not another gym in Birmingham I'd ever go to! I've accomplished so much more than I ever thought possible with the help of the Forge coaches.

resp.text: Thank you Haleigh for the awesome review and we love having you as part of the Forge family.

text: Great gym, great people.  Dropped in for a class while traveling and had a great workout.  Rich and Conrad made us feel right at home.  I'll be back next time we're in town.

Great gym!!! Awesome equipment all well maintained. Great lockers and restrooms. We even brought our kids with us and there is a room for them to hang out.

resp.text: We are so glad you enjoyed Forge. Thank you for the feedback and we look forward to seeing you again.

name: ryan barkley
text: I've dropped into Boxes all over Alabama, Florida, and Louisiana and these guys might be the friendliest. Really enjoyed the WOD. Great environment to train. Owner is a class act.

resp.text: Hey Ryan!! Thank you for such a great review! We loved having you and you crushed the WOD. Hope you enjoy your volleyball tournament! Come back any time!

name: Tyler Thompson
text: Great CrossFit experience! Great people and great atmosphere. The coaches really know their stuff and are very helpful. Highly recommend this place!

resp.text: Great review and we truly appreciate your energy at Forge. However, we need a Tyler bicep region for every member.

text: Great atmosphere, great owners and coaches! My day isn’t complete until I’ve been to the gym!

resp.text: We love you Jess and thank you for the review!

name: Jason Jaegers
text: Forge is a great place to work out. Not only is the facility clean and convenient but the staff is friendly and professional. The camaraderie between the members is as goods as it gets.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome feedback! Come see us soon.

name: Scotty Bostick
text: Awesome experience! Would rate 6 stars

resp.text: Thank you brother!

name: Tyler Landolt
text: Everyone involved in this gym is amazing! The coaches, the members and the owner all come together to make one amazing community.

resp.text: You are awesome Tyler. Thank you for the review.

name: Jake C.
text: I've been coming to this gym for several years now.  Rich and the coaches at the gym are very enthusiastic and have always been incredibly attentive to my needs.  Caleb and Conrad always take the time to pay extra attention to beginners or people that need additional instruction and always do a great job leading class and keeping things fun.  The gym community is very welcoming to beginners and visitors and the atmosphere is very family friendly.  The gym itself is clean, spacious and well-organized.  I was spoiled by the fact that it had Heat when I dropped into a few other gyms last winter and nearly froze to death.  If you are looking for a superb Crossfit gym to join or just visit while in town, Forge is a solid place to do tough workouts with great people.

resp.text: Thank you so much Jake for being such a valuable asset to Forge. It's been impressive watching you meet your Fitness goals since starting CrossFit. You have done a great job and we look forward to watching you dominate the CrossFit Open in 2017.

text: Forge has such a strong sense of community and the new facility is so functional!

resp.text: Thanks for the review. Keep them coming.

name: Stephanie Odle

text: Great experience for a great value. Caleb Dodd is a great coach and motivator. Class times and locations are perfect for anyone, espcially for those who live or work over the mountain.

name: Rodney Overstreet
text: I visited this box last Sat for their inaugural WOD. It was really tough and fun. Full disclosure: Rich & Chris are friends of mine. However, they are also enthusiastic, friendly, & knowledgable coaches. The space is large and well designed. I can recommend this box without reservation.

resp.text: Thank you Rodney for all the support!

name: Matt Mogle
text: Great gym with a great community. I've been to other Crossfit gyms around the World and this one is special. It's an incredibly encouraging environment and a wonderful place to watch people continue to get better and excel every day. Really cool to see your seasoned Crossfit veterans working out right next to beginners and encouraging one another throughout.

name: Deborah Pennino
text: Great close-knitted gym with experienced and friendly staff.  It is very clean and has excellent equipment for workouts.

resp.text: Thank you for the AWESOME review!

name: Clarisse Jackson
text: I've never crossFit before and after searching for different gyms, I couldn't be happier to have chosen Forge. The atmosphere, the people and best of all the owners Chris and Rich show true commitment to their members and are able to push you to your limits in the safest way possible. I've tried different classes and exercises but was never constant because I will get bored, well let me tell you; I haven't gotten bored since I started going to Forge, it has been 9 months so far and I don't want to stop. I look forward to my classes and to the people that I've met at the gym. Plus is clean, has A/C and they put great music. So if you are looking into CrossFit in this area, this is the place to be!!!

resp.text: You are awesome and we truly appreciate your support!

name: Stacey Hood
text: Great gym, been to several others, but this place is top level and professional from the moment you walk in. It's everything that anyone could ever want in a CrossFit gym.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback and we appreciate the support!

name: Brooks Gant
text: Cannot say enough good things about Forge Fitness in Vestavia! Coming from a cycling and running background, I was burnt out and looking for something new and challenging. After speaking with several crossfit gyms in the area, something just felt "right" about Forge and so I joined the 101 class. 9 months later I am probably in the best overall shape I have ever been in! From all the coaches who truly care about their athletes, to the positive and encouraging atmosphere, as well as all the great people I have met, if you have ever thought about giving crossfit a try, I highly recommend checking out Forge Fitness.

resp.text: Wow Brooks, thank you for the awesome review and we truly love having you as a solid member of the Forge Family. Keep up the great work!

name: Sharon A. Moskowitz
text: CrossFit Shades / Forge Fitness is awesome.  I travel to the Birmingham area for work once a month and was looking for a gym/box that has hours on Sunday.  I had heard some not-so-great things about a few boxes but I hadn't heard of Forge Fitness/ CF Shades.  Not only is CF Shades the only place with Sunday hours, but they were above and beyond wonderfully welcoming when I showed up unannounced during their open gym period.  Upon first glance, the gym was very clean, which is not very common among CrossFit and Crossfit-inspired facilities.  The owner, Rich, jumped up from a staff meeting and gave me a tour and after learning of my CF history, invited me to use any and all of their space as well as invited me back through my duration of stay while in town.  They have an awesome workout space out back with a platform, squat racks and a rig and the running course around the building is super safe.  I also met coaches Caleb, Josh and Rebecca who were all very accommodating and friendly.  When I returned for a class, Rebecca coached and I really appreciated her attentiveness.  I'm a CrossFit coach in Denver and because I move relatively well, I tend to get left alone - but I love being coached when I drop into new places and Rebecca was great.  I HIGHLY RECOMMEND travelers and locals to visit.  If you're a member somewhere else in Hometown or Birmingham, switch now.   I'll be back there for sure when I'm in town next.

resp.text: Hey Sharon, Thank you very much for this amazing review. This has to be the best review anyone could ever receive. We truly appreciate what you are doing and we look forward to seeing you next time you are back in the area.

name: Justin Missanelli
text: Friendly environment for fitness.  Competitive for those serious workout fiends. Don't let the afternoon classes intimidate you though, the people are friendly if you just talk to them.

name: Clay Conner
text: Great gym, great people and great results! Highly recommended.

resp.text: You left out great programming and great workouts. We love you Clay and we appreciate everything you do for Forge.

text: If you are looking for a clean and spacious gym with an abundant supply of the nicest equipment in town then Quad is your spot. I have dropped into Quad a few times. name: Sarah Ladick
text: Quad is an awesome place to train. The facility is so spacious, clean and all the equipment is well taken care of. The coaches that lead the classes help you every step of the way. Everyone is so friendly you feel like family. Highly recommend!

resp.text: You are family and it’s awesome to have you and the family working out with us again!

name: Grant Scoble
text: Quad did an excellent job of getting me back in the game. I also was able to learn best practices for recovery by having their recovery center available with my membership. You feel apart of a family as soon as you walk in.
